verbs.description: Before [V: being] replaced by the perpetually wrong Larry Kudlow , Gary Cohn served as Donald Trump ’s top economic adviser . Now he ’s free to say whatever he wants , and he ’s throwing a little shade at the guy whose face will be on the $ 1 trillion bill ...
